Integration with Webspace or external systems
After ordering or successfully transferring your domain, it will appear in the Key2Host management panel. From there, you can:
Adjust DNS entries or point them to Webspace/IPs
Set up subdomains and link them with services
Domains can be transferred to Key2Host at any time. Please ensure the Auth-Code is valid and the domain does not have a transfer lock enabled.
